analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xbb4a05d930c234865f0a37cf9d6a01ece29b0f8d.sol:
	Contract BR has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xbb4a05d930c234865f0a37cf9d6a01ece29b0f8d.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/42/0xbb4a05d930c234865f0a37cf9d6a01ece29b0f8d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/42/0xbb4a05d930c234865f0a37cf9d6a01ece29b0f8d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xbb4a05d930c234865f0a37cf9d6a01ece29b0f8d.sol#90-91) is not in mixedCase
